name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
schedule:
教材大綱/Syllabus：
Week 1: Introduction(1), Nature (2)
Week 2: MechProp(3), PhysProp(4)
Week 3: Metal Casting(7, 8)
Week 4: Shaping Plastics(10), Composites(11)
Week 5: Powder(12), Ceramics(13)
Week 6: Metal Forming(14), Metalworking(15)
Week 7: Quiz & Discussion
Week 8: Machining(17), Tool(18)
Week 9:　　Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Grinding(21), Surface(24)
Week 11: Welding(25, 26)
Week 12: Mechanical assembly(28), RP(29)
Week 13: IC(30), Packaging(31)
Week 14: MicroFab(32), NanoFab(33)
Week 15: Quiz & Disc, AutoManuf(34), IntegManuf(35)
Week 16: EngMatls(5), Dimensions(6)
Week 17: Machinabiligy(20), Quality(37)
Week 18:　　Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: 　　Principles of Modern Manufacturing, 5/e, M. P. Groover, Wiley, 2013.
Reference:   1.　　Materials & Processes in Manufacturing, J. T. Black & R. A. Kohser, Wiley, 2013.
2.　　Manufacturing Engineering and Technology, S. Kalpakjian & S. R. Schmid, Pearson, 2014.
